alert.note: Alert for Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:42PM EDT until July 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TUSCOLA COUNTY... At 242 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kingston, or 8 miles north of Marlette, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Tuscola County, including the following locations... Wilmot, East Dayton and Deford. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
